summary: When poor peasants kidnap a magistrate's daughter to coerce him into reducing their unfair taxes, a wandering ronin decides to give them some help.
cast: Tetsurô Tanba|Isamu Nagato|Mikijirô Hira|Miyuki Kuwano|Yoshiko Kayama|Kyôko Aoi|Kamatari Fujiwara|Tatsuya Ishiguro|Hisashi Igawa|Ichirô Izawa|Jun Tatara|Toshie Kimura|Yôko Mihara|Kichijirô Ueda|Nakajirô Tomita|Bokuzen Hidari|Mitsuo Nagata|Hiroshi Mugiyama|Hisashi Imabashi|Sakae Umezu|Junkichi Orimoto|Yoshiaki Aoki|Saburo Hoshiki|Jun Ooi|Saburô Kumoi|Hajime Miyazawa|Kôtarô Mori|Kyôichi Satô|Keiichi Taki|Shôsaburô Aihara|Hajime Katô|Kinto Tamura|Taisuke Minami|Suketarô Taki|Kenzô Tanaka|Shinpachi Kura|Takaaki Kadota|Kunichika Nagai|Tadayuki Okamoto|Nishimiya Kenji|Shôhei Yasuda|Sôshirô Matsumoto|Itoko Wakaura|Fujio Sasagawa|Saburô Kômyôji|Isao Shizume|Shûichirô Narita|Ryôta Minowada|Masaru Soro|Kenjirô Nakase|Kazuo Ôkita|Minoru Miyagi|Yuzuru Asaoka|Reiko Kawachi|Mutsue Tsurugi|Hajime Araki|Sentarô Hayashi|Hiroshi Mihara|Jôji Hashizume|Hisashi Hoshino|Kôji Tsutsui|Tsuyoshi Date|Tôru Hatozaki|Shinichi Tsuyama|Ryûji Fujisawa
title: Sanbiki no samurai
